snippet: Defender Thiago Silva has criticised Brazil coach Dunga and star player Neymar after claiming neither of them told him he was no longer Brazil captain....

headline.print_headline: Thiago Silva Hits Out at Dunga and Neymar After Losing Captaincy
headline.main: Thiago Silva Hits Out at Dunga and Neymar After Losing Captaincy

lead_paragraph: Defender Thiago Silva has criticised Brazil coach Dunga and star player Neymar after claiming neither of them told him he was no longer Brazil captain.
